response.overview: Police Brain is a Kannada action drama, directed by Shobha and starring Sihi Kahi Chandru, Kishor Kumar and Vagdevi. Vijay courts arrest for his girlfriendâ€™s murder, though his friend is the actual culprit. Two convicts, escape from jail along with Vijay, and kidnap Dr. Anand. Vijay poses as Dr. Anand, but a friend of the latter gets suspicious. Watch the full movie Police Brain, online, only on Hotstar.
response.title: Police Brain
